sn6.6:3.1: 6. Brahmalokasutta
sn6.6:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā divāvihāragato hoti paṭisallīno.
sn6.6:4.3: Atha kho subrahmā ca paccekabrahmā suddhāvāso ca paccekabrahmā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn6.6:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā paccekaṃ dvārabāhaṃ upanissāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
sn6.6:4.5: Atha kho subrahmā paccekabrahmā suddhāvāsaṃ paccekabrahmānaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.6:4.8: Asuko ca brahmaloko iddho ceva phīto ca, brahmā ca tatra pamādavihāraṃ viharati.
sn6.6:4.9: Āyāma, mārisa, yena so brahmaloko tenupasaṅkamissāma;
sn6.6:4.11: “Evaṃ, mārisā”ti kho suddhāvāso paccekabrahmā subrahmuno paccekabrahmuno paccassosi.
sn6.6:5.1: Atha kho subrahmā ca paccekabrahmā suddhāvāso ca paccekabrahmā—
sn6.6:5.4: bhagavato purato antarahitā tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahesuṃ.
sn6.6:5.5: Addasā kho so brahmā te brahmāno dūratova āgacchante.
sn6.6:5.8: “Āgatā kho mayaṃ, mārisa, amha tassa bhagavato santikā arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
sn6.6:5.9: Gaccheyyāsi pana tvaṃ, mārisa, tassa bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti?
sn6.6:6.1: Evaṃ vutto, kho so brahmā taṃ vacanaṃ anadhivāsento sahassakkhattuṃ attānaṃ abhinimminitvā subrahmānaṃ paccekabrahmānaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.6:6.2: “passasi me no tvaṃ, mārisa, evarūpaṃ iddhānubhāvan”ti?
sn6.6:6.4: “So khvāhaṃ, mārisa, evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo kassa aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmī”ti?
sn6.6:7.1: Atha kho subrahmā paccekabrahmā dvisahassakkhattuṃ attānaṃ abhinimminitvā taṃ brahmānaṃ etadavoca:
sn6.6:7.2: “passasi me no tvaṃ, mārisa, evarūpaṃ iddhānubhāvan”ti?
sn6.6:7.4: “Tayā ca kho, mārisa, mayā ca sveva bhagavā mahiddhikataro ceva mahānubhāvataro ca.
sn6.6:7.5: Gaccheyyāsi tvaṃ, mārisa, tassa bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti?
sn6.6:7.6: Atha kho so brahmā subrahmānaṃ paccekabrahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn6.6:8.3: Tayidaṃ vimānaṃ jalate ca brahme,
sn6.6:10.1: Atha kho subrahmā ca paccekabrahmā suddhāvāso ca paccekabrahmā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsu.
sn6.6:10.2: Agamāsi ca kho so brahmā aparena samayena bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassāti.
